divs: sighting detailsi just walked out the door to do some work in my yard and a buddy of mmine noticed something in the sky so i grabed my minoculars from my truck. when i focused on i saw this object spinning and lots of bright lights shining. it looked alove. i handed him the minoculars and ran in the house to get my camcorder. i couldnt believe what i was recording almost like a dream. i noticed after several minutes i didnt hear or see any planes leaving or going to the airport for at least 10-15 mins then i lost sight. the next day i woke up with bleeding in my mouth and nose. never happened before. anyways i havent had much sleep after seeing this object so i will leave it at that. this can be viewed at *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg).
